data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Ag4cyxA2RTcQ7kNvgFDMZYG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDLZITHN9BXIBv3LKhAwJcqNdbV7iBbpkerLThgovCPfA&oe=66ACC137)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oYbDmljKAG4Q7kNvgE1Zx5Q&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCYjL-nLNQaWJmiTfwXi_GQ8gnNdEGVxaucKOjODnQNwA&oe=66ACCED2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DxKB1YZytNUQ7kNvgFkVIU8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBy5sU6cC9fKcdZZNJybmN1cfLg1lppcApIlDgx_rS74w&oe=66ACBA09)
